availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George N. Davis (Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Ann Davis. Married to Lucy Vanersdall Davis in Mercer County, Kentucky, on November 23, 1853. Father of Anna Davis, Mollie Davis, and William Davis. Farmer in Mercer County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Mercer County in 1850. Farmer in Mercer County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Mercer County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, p. 285B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 1, p. 853.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, p. 721.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, p. 51B.
"George N. Davis (1819-1879," Find A Grave, Memorial 68808738, accessed July 3, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/68808738.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mercer County Marriages, Film 000191861.
